docs.title: Welcome to the Data Sampler
docs.text:
A choice selection of small datasets for use in data pipelines and analytics.

For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Have a cup!
docs.text:
Photo by Nathan Dumlao on Unsplash

The Coffee Sales data is a good example of accounting and sales data by time, value and location. It can be joined to the Travel table to identify patterns where the drinker consumed caffeine in different locations.

It's sourced from ten years of transaction data, captured in a YNAB Budget, cleaned and simplified.

Download the data and take a shot at the Challenges.

docs.title: Sales
docs.text:
Method Date Payee Amount Checking 2014-01-06 Dunn Brothers Coffee 2.09 Checking 2014-01-06 Dunn Brothers Coffee 2.09 Checking 2014-01-06 Starbucks 10.0 Checking 2014-01-06 Starbucks 10.0

The Sales data has these Methods:

  • Amex
  • Blue
  • Checking
  • Discover
  • Travel
  • Visa
